Client - Class in main
GUI chat client runner.

The main class for the IM Client.

close() - Method in class client.ConversationPanel
Cancels all pending messages in this conversation, removes this conversation from our collection of ongoing conversations, and sends an EXIT_CONV message to server to let it know that we are leaving the conversation.
close() - Method in class test.TestClient
Closes this TestUtility by closing each of this.in, this.out, and this.socket.

CONNECTED - Static variable in class network.NetworkConstants
 
connectedDisconnectTest() - Method in class server.ServerTest
Expect a disconnected message to be sent to all other connected users when a user who is connected to the server sends a disconnect message.
ConnectWindow - Class in client
Window which prompts the user for parameters to connect to an IM server.

containsExistingUserTest() - Method in class server.ConversationTest
Expect that contains returns true when a User is in the conversation.
containsNewUserTest() - Method in class server.ConversationTest
Expect that contains returns false when a User is not in the conversation.
containsNullTest() - Method in class server.ConversationTest
Expect that contains returns false when given null.
CONV_NAME - Static variable in class network.NetworkConstants
 
convDoesNotExistEnterConvTest() - Method in class server.ServerTest
Expect an error message to be sent when a user tries to enter a conversation that does not exist.
convDoesNotExistExitConvTest() - Method in class server.ServerTest
Expect an error message to be sent when a user tries to exit a conversation that does not exist.
convDoesNotExistIMTest() - Method in class server.ServerTest
Expect error message to be sent to sending client when an IM message is sent to a conversation that doesn't exist.
convDoesNotExistRetrieveParticipantsTest() - Method in class server.ServerTest
Expect an error message to be sent when a user who is connected to the server sends a retrieve participants message to the server for a conversation that does not exist.
Conversation - Class in server
Conversations in guichat are represented by instances of Conversation.
ConversationHistory - Class in client
Stores the history of received messages (not including pending messages).

Panel displaying a single conversation.

ConversationTabComponent - Class in client
Component to be used as tabComponent; Contains a JLabel to show the text and a JButton to close the tab it belongs to

ConversationTest - Class in server
JUnit Tests for the Conversation class.
ConversationTest() - Constructor for class server.ConversationTest
 
convExistsAndEmptyRetrieveParticipantsTest() - Method in class server.ServerTest
Expect a participants message to be sent when a user who is connected to the server sends a retrieve participants message to the server for a conversation that exists but is empty.
convExistsAndNonEmptyRetrieveParticipantsTest() - Method in class server.ServerTest
Expect a participants message to be sent when a user who is connected to the server sends a retrieve participants message to the server for a conversation that exists and is non-empty.
createIMMessage() - Method in class client.ConversationPanel
Sends out an IM message according to the user input.
createInviteMessage() - Method in class client.ConversationPanel
Invites the user whose name is in the "invite" field to this conversation.
